data.title: Kay Kay Menon wins Dadasaheb Phalke Award for Most Versatile Actor, shares pics
meta_keywords: Kay Kay Menon dadsaheb phalke award
data.meta_description: Kay Kay Menon has been awarded the Dadasaheb Phalke Award recently. He shared pictures of his trophy on Instagram.
data.text:
Actor Kay Kay Menon has been felicitated with the Dadasaheb Phalke Award for the Most Versatile Actor. The actor is surely on cloud nine after receiving the honour and he shared glimpses of the trophy he received on Instagram. Menon also thanked Dadasaheb Phalke International Film Festival for bestowing on him this honour.

WHAT DID KAY KAY MENON SHARE?

Kay Kay Menon took to Instagram to share two pictures of the award that he received recently. He received the award in the Most Versatile Actor category. “Thank you!! @dpiff_official (sic),” he captioned the post. Kay Kay Menon has been part of the industry for the last three decades and he has been felicitated for his extraordinary work and contribution to Indian cinema.

advertisement

PM MODI’S SPECIAL MESSAGE TO THE TEAM OF DPIFF AND THE WINNERS

Prime Minister Narendra Modi sent out a special letter to the team of Dadasaheb Phalke International Film Festival (DPIFF) and the winners of the prestigious award. "It is a pleasure to learn about the Dadasaheb Phalke International Film Festival Awards 2021. The awards celebrate the legacy of Dadasaheb Phalke, a true visionary, whose pioneering role in the glorious journey of Indian cinema is Indelible,” a part of PM Modi’s letter read.

"Heartiest congratulations to all the award winners. May the awards inspire various stakeholders to take the art of storytelling to higher levels of excellence. Best wishes for the all-around success of the Film Festival Awards 2021,” saying this, he ended the letter.

KAY KAY MENON’S BOLLYWOOD CAREER

Kay Kay Menon started his career as a theatre actor and has also featured in a few television serials. Menon made his Bollywood debut in a small role in the 1995 film Naseem. A few years later, Kay Kay Menon was seen in Bhopal Express in which he bagged the lead role. Over the years, Kay Kay Menon has starred in a slew of critically acclaimed films including Black Friday, Hazaaron Khwaishein Aisi, Sarkar, Life in a... Metro, Ankur Arora Murder Case, Shahid, Haider, Shaurya and The Stoneman Murders, among others. Paanch, his film with Anurag Kashyap, remains unreleased to this day.
